sentence.Network_en: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
sentence.Network_cn: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

sentence.Network_en: I made tea for all and sundry at the office.
sentence.Network_cn: 我给办公室的每个人冲了一杯茶。

sentence.Network_en: He was well known to all and sundry.

lj.lj_ly: I don't want all and sundry knowing about our problems
lj.lj_ls: 我不想人人都知道我们的问题。

lj.lj_ly: She invited all and sundry to her party.
lj.lj_ls: 她邀请所有的人都来参加聚会.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English syndrig 'distinct, separate'; related to sunder

entry.tran: 各式各样的;形色各异的;杂七杂八的
entry.def: If someone refers to sundry people or things, they are referring to several people or things that are all different from each other.

example.ex: Scientists, business people, and sundry others gathered on Monday for the official opening...
example.tran: 星期一的正式开幕式上,科学家、商界人士和其他各色人等齐聚一堂。

example.ex: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
example.tran: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

example.ex: I made tea for all and sundry at the office...
example.tran: 我给办公室的每个人冲了一杯茶。

example.ex: He was well known to all and sundry.

means.word_mean: 1. consisting of a haphazard assortment of different kinds (even to the point of incongruity);

sentences.sentence: "a mixed program of baroque and contemporary music"
"sundry sciences commonly known as social"- I.A.Richards

sentences.en: This cream can be used to treat sundry minor injuries.
sentences.cn: 这种药膏可用来治各种轻伤。

sentences.en: I don’t like you talking about my personal problems to all and sundry.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢你把我的私人问题告诉所有人。
